text: William Roger Clemens (born August 4, 1962 in Dayton, Ohio) was an American starting pitcher in Major League Baseball. Clemens played in the major leagues for 24 seasons for the Boston Red Sox, Toronto Blue Jays, New York Yankees, and Houston Astros, from to . Clemens has won seven Cy Young Awards, two more than any other pitcher. == Other websites == * *Baseball Library *Biography from the Roger Clemens Foundation * *Roger Clemens ads in the ZADZADZ ad database Category:1962 births Category:American baseball players Category:American League All-Stars Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Houston Astros players Category:Living people Category:National League All-Stars Category:New York Yankees players Category:Sportspeople from Dayton, Ohio Category:Toronto Blue Jays players
title: Roger Clemens
